001package imagingbook.pub.regions.utils;
002
003import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
004import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
005import ij.process.ShortProcessor;
006import imagingbook.lib.color.RandomColorGenerator;
007import imagingbook.pub.regions.segment.BinaryRegionSegmentation;
008
009public abstract class Display {
010        
011        /**
012         * Utility method that creates an image to display a binary segmentation.
013         * 
014         * @param labeling The region segmentation.
015         * @param color Set {@code true} to color the detected regions.
016         * @return an image of the label array.
017         */
018        public static ImageProcessor makeLabelImage(BinaryRegionSegmentation labeling, boolean color) {
019                return (color) ?  makeLabelImageColor(labeling) : makeLabelImageGray(labeling);
020        }
021
022        private static ColorProcessor makeLabelImageColor(BinaryRegionSegmentation segmentation) {
023                int minLabel = segmentation.getMinLabel();
024                int maxLabel = segmentation.getMaxLabel();
025                int[] colorLUT = new int[maxLabel+1];
026                RandomColorGenerator rcg = new RandomColorGenerator();
027                
028                for (int i = minLabel; i <= maxLabel; i++) {
029                        colorLUT[i] = rcg.nextColor().getRGB(); //makeRandomColor();
030                }
031                
032                int width = segmentation.getWidth();
033                int height = segmentation.getHeight();
034                
035                ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(width, height);
036                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
037                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
038                                int lb = segmentation.getLabel(u, v);
039                                if (lb >= 0 && lb < colorLUT.length) {
040                                        cp.putPixel(u, v, colorLUT[lb]);
041                                }
042                        }
043                }
044                return cp;
045        }
046        
047        private static ShortProcessor makeLabelImageGray(BinaryRegionSegmentation labeling) {
048                int width = labeling.getWidth();
049                int height = labeling.getHeight();
050                ShortProcessor sp = new ShortProcessor(width, height);
051                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
052                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
053                                int lb = labeling.getLabel(u, v);
054                                sp.set(u, v, (lb >= 0) ? lb : 0);
055                        }
056                }
057                sp.resetMinAndMax();
058                return sp;
059        }
060        
061//      private static int makeRandomColor() {
062//              double saturation = 0.2;
063//              double brightness = 0.2;
064//              float h = (float) Math.random();
065//              float s = (float) (saturation * Math.random() + 1 - saturation);
066//              float b = (float) (brightness * Math.random() + 1 - brightness);
067//              return Color.HSBtoRGB(h, s, b);
068//      }
069
070}
